At UNDRCar, we're not just mechanics; we're automotive enthusiasts on a mission.

Our expert team thrives on tackling the unique challenges your vehicle presents.

We bring innovation and precision to every service, ensuring your car runs at its best.

Suspension diagnostics

Checking the condition of shock absorbers and springs to identify faults.

Computer Diagnostics

Inspection of the suspension system to identify technical faults and issues.

Cylinder Head Repair

Restoration of the cylinder head to ensure proper engine operation.

Brake System Repair

Resolving brake system malfunctions to enhance safety and performance.

Engine Oil and Filter Replacement

Changing oil and filters for smooth and uninterrupted engine operation.

Transmission Fluid Replacement

Replacing transmission fluid to ensure smooth and reliable vehicle performance.

Timing Chain and Belt Replacement

Replacing timing chains and belts for optimal engine performance and reliability.

Clutch Kit Replacement

Updating the clutch kit for smooth gear shifts and enhanced driving experience.

US Car Restoration

Comprehensive repair of imported vehicles from the USA to restore them to condition.
